Desc.entry:
A chargeable service providing a rolling programme of groups for men aged 50 years and over, including those in receipt of individual budgets. The programme runs over a 12 week period for 2 hours per week and is tailored to meet the needs of the group via support planning. The groups are an ideal way to meet new friends and like minded individuals and share common interests and hobbies such as snooker, cards, visits to places of interest etc. Please contact for further information.
A registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 5207254
